sourceMeaningMnemonic: You use <radical>thread</radical> and <radical>writing</radical> to sew our <kanji>family crest</kanji>. You've been sewing your family crest since you were a kid, you could do it today with your eyes closed.
meaningInfo: Imagine the thread slowly forming the writing that makes up your family crest. You're making a scarf with your crest on it. It's like a wizarding school house symbol.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>family crest</kanji> is of a <reading>mon</reading>ster! And the writing says "Our Family Monster."
readingInfo: What kind of monster is on your family crest? Picture it in your mind right now. Now tweet to us @wanikaniapp because I really want to know what you came up with!!
